701705f-b.text:
River Avenue, at the S.W. corner of E. 151st Street, showing the Bronx County Jail under construction at the above location. The view is northward from E. 150th Street and shows also the Bronx Municipal Terminal Market (left).

View 2 shows the County Jail, as seen from E. 153rd Street, near Grand Concourse.

View 1: May 29, 1936
View 2: June 9, 1940

P.L. Sperr
